SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT SEARCH_KEYWORD searchKeyword ,COUNT(SEARCH_KEYWORD) COUNT FROM SEARCH WHERE TO_DATE(SEARCH_DATE,'YY/MM/DD') > TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') - 7 GROUP BY SEARCH_KEYWORD ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
